column5: It has been a hectic few weeks since the puter crashed.  A lot of visits to Drs and hospitals, for my family, have been the priority the past while. The computer just did not seem so important. Anyhow, all are well, recovering, or as good as they are gonna be.
Good to see you back Bruce.  I was starting to worry!
Good to hear from you Bruce.
I was wondering the same thing Bruce... glad you're back and all is good now
I was wondering what was going on.Glad to see ya back safe and sound.Hope all is back to normal.
